arts.ttl: Lazio vs. Udinese closes out matchday 28
arts.sum: Udinese have won their last two league matches against Lazio (both 2-1), in March and August 2024; the Friulians could win three games in a row against the Biancocelesti in Serie A for the first time since between December 2004 and October 2005. There have been three wins each and four draws in the last 10 league matches between Lazio and Udinese, after the Biancocelesti had won nine of the 10 previous matches between these two teams in Serie A (D1).

arts.ttl: Lazio vs Udinese | Serie A | Team News & Probable Lineups
